section.name: CEALKKALAHTUIN LEAT EANET GO OKTA SÁTNI - THE CONSTITUENTS CONSIST OF MORE THAN ONE WORD
Subjeakta + Verbála + Adverbiála - Subject + Verbal + Adverbial

corpus.section:
